org.jtrim.access

Interface AccessChangeAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ButtonCancelSwitcher, ComponentDecorator, ComponentDisabler

    public interface AccessChangeAction
    The listener interface to be invoked when the availability of a right group changes. That is, when a group of rights become available or unavailable in an AccessManager.

    AccessChangeAction implementations are intended to be added to an AccessAvailabilityNotifier.

    Thread safety

    Most implementation of this interface are not required to be thread-safe but AccessManager managing the rights, may define otherwise.

    Synchronization transparency

    Implementations of this listener are not required to be synchronization transparent however they must not wait for asynchronous events.
    See Also:
    AccessAvailabilityNotifier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChangeAccess(boolean available)
      Invoked when a specific group of right availability changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onChangeAccess

        void onChangeAccess(boolean available)
        Invoked when a specific group of right availability changes. The group of rights are normally defined when the AccessChangeAction is added to an AccessAvailabilityNotifier.
        Parameters:
        available - true if the group of right, this AccessChangeAction listens is available, false if not
